channel.title: How do i make, my own Npc's!
channel.description:
Hello i've made some npc's well, i want some guards in edge wildy, and i put this in.
spawn = 3231 3114 3518 0 0 0 0 0 1 Guards
And i complie it andno errors, but when i run it i get..
At Java.lang.numberformatexcption.forinputstring(Numberformatexception. Java:48) At java.lang.integer.parseintinteger.java:456) At java.lang.integer.parseintinteger.java:497) at npchandler.loadautospaw(npchandler.jva:2512) at npchandler.(init)nochandler.java:30) :: Failed! Press any key to cntinue . . .
Please help thanks!

item.title: How do i make, my own Npc's!
item.dc:creator: @mod_kay mod kay
item.description:
@mod_kay wrote:

Ok,thanks i’ll try now :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2008, 01:56:12 PM[/size][hr]I’m still gettig,
At Java.lang.numberformatexcption.forinputstring(Numberformatexception.
Java:48)
At java.lang.integer.parseintinteger.java:456)
At java.lang.integer.parseintinteger.java:497)
at npchandler.loadautospaw(npchandler.jva:2512)
at npchandler.(init)nochandler.java:30)
:: Failed!
Press any key to cntinue . . .

And i’ve done this.

spawn = 170 3090 3489 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Players

spawn = 2475 3090 3492 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Players

spawn = 1 3092 3489 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Players

spawn = 3229 3115 3519 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Guard
//–End Of Shops

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make, my own Npc's!

item.title: How do i make, my own Npc's!
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

All of 3786 2667 2648 0 2669 2649 2665 2647 2 Void Knight that has to be seperated by tabs. Or it won’t work.

Read full topic
